title: Chik's great adventure
brief_description: The story of Scouting in Malaya. Chik’s “great adventure” began when he joined the Boy Scouts because scouting gave him adventure, companionship, healthy activity and an opportunity for service in his community. The film provides useful information on the aims and objects of the Scout Movement in Malaya.
